summary:
This is a 100% Bug Free Compatibility Mod for Custom Races.
You can switch between Vanilla Races & Custom Races that use this, no matter what load order they are in & have full werewolf, Vampire & Vampire Lord abilities with no bugs. Even Includes Hybrid Capabilities. So you can be werewolf & Vampire at the same time.
NOW SUPPORTS BETTER VAMPIRES
descriptionHtml:
MontyX\'s Race Compatibility Mod (MXRC)

There are 2 different versions, that work with or without Dawnguard.
 
DON\'T EXPECT  THIS TO WORK WITH OTHER CUSTOM RACES THAT ARE NOT IN THE LIST!
AS MODDERS BECOME AWARE OF HOW GREAT THIS WORKS , THERE WILL BE MORE RACES.

Optional Version for BETTER VAMPIRES V2.6

This is a 100% Bug Free Compatibility Mod for Custom Races.
You can switch between Vanilla Races & Custom Races that use this, no matter what load order they are in & have full werewolf, Vampire & Vampire Lord abilities with no bugs. 

Added Fixes to Amulets, Rings, Clothes & Armor; to display correctly on all races & Custom Races. Dark Brotherhood: To Kill an Empire Has been altered to skip Race checking. Added a fix for Hybrid Capabilities. So you can be werewolf & Vampire at the same time.

This is not a remake of The Race Compatibility Mod.
If feel that mod is broken for Dawnguard, & doesn\'t suit my anal retentiveness.
So I created an easier, non conflicting system, for custom Races.

FOR NO BUGS WITH VAMPIRE LORD MORPHING.
DO NOT SWITCH TO THIS RACE AS A VAMPIRE.
YOU MUST CURE YOURSELF OF VAMPIRISM BEFORE YOU USE THIS.
MAKE SURE YOU SAVE YOUR GAME ON FIRST USE OF THIS MOD.
EXIT SKYRIM, THEN RELOAD THE SAVED GAME.
THIS WILL ALLOW FOR THE SCRIPTS TO ADDJUST.
Sorry, but I have to make it clear.

DON\'T ACTIVATE MORE THAN ONE CUSTOM RACE WHEN FIRST USING MXRC.
If you want to use more than one race with MXRC.
only add one at a time IN-BETWEEN SAVING & RELOADING Skyrim.
otherwise the Race scripts will add them in the Racelists in the wrong order.
Causing you to turn in to the wrong Custom Vampire Race, or be Cured as the wrong Race.

Custom Race Mods using this System:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37592/]Frosmer Race - Frost Elf Redux[/url] (Dawnguard Only)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24397/]The Noiral Reloaded[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000036561]Naiad Race - By Den987[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37731/]Return of the Falmer Redux[/url]
Demonic Race (Conversion Under Construction)
MontyX\'s Elven Races (Conversion Under Construction)
Rise of the Falmer (Conversion Under Construction)
Predators - The Lost Tribes  (Conversion Under Construction)
Zabrak Race - (Conversion Under Construction)

Many Race Mod Authors are creating a version for this Compatibility Mod.
I am, converting my races to suit this Compatibility Mod.
I been given Permission to Convert some race mods for this Compatibility Mod.
author: MontaugeX
